      String addProduct(ArrayList<Products> products, String propertyname)
      Used for adding a product from enter id, name, namedescription, description, companyname, price, quantity, picturename, publishstatus and what main- and minorcategories it belongs to.

      String bulkEditPublished(String attribute, boolean changeValue, ArrayList<Products> products, String propertyname)

      Used for displaying the count of published and non published products in a chart on the index page.
      boolean checkIfProductExists(String productid, String propertyname)
      Used to see if a product already exists.
      ArrayList<Products> dbDownload(String propertyname)
      When we need to download the content of the database this method is used for selecting all with a join again and result.get 10/11 is skipped as the document we download should consist of readable data so not binary.

      Used for deleting a product from it's id.

      • jsonInsertOrUpdateToDB

        public void jsonInsertOrUpdateToDB(ArrayList<Products> list,
                                   String propertyname)
                            throws ClassNotFoundException,
                                   SQLException,
                                   IOException
        Once the json file has been uploaded we need to add the information to the database. This method will either create or update the product information that is in the database. The method will also make calls to other mappers in order to check if a product has already been added, if a category already exists or needs to be created.
        Specified by:
        jsonInsertOrUpdateToDB in interface ProductMapperInterface
        Parameters:
        list - holds all the values of the products
        propertyname - used for checking to execute in production or test.
        Throws:
        ClassNotFoundException
        SQLException
        IOException

      • ifElseString

        public String ifElseString(String string)
        Parameters:
        string - - the product logic it takes in.
        Returns:
        Used for when uploading to set null so it doesn't show "" in db.

      • checkIfProductExists

        public boolean checkIfProductExists(String productid,
                                    String propertyname)
                             throws ClassNotFoundException,
                                    SQLException,
                                    IOException
        Used to see if a product already exists. If it does the previous method will either update if it's an upload of a file. Or send an error if it's for creating a product with an already existing productid.
        Specified by:
        checkIfProductExists in interface ProductMapperInterface
        Parameters:
        productid - the id of the product
        propertyname - for db connection
        Returns:
        returns true or false depending on if product exists.

        ClassNotFoundException

      • showAllProducts

        public ArrayList<Products> showAllProducts(String propertyname)
                                    throws ClassNotFoundException,
                                           SQLException,
                                           IOException
        Shows all the products in the database that exists. It does a join on the categoryIDs in order to get the category names for the user. The result.next skips 10 and 11 because these are the IDs of the categories and we have no need to see these as this is only used for the backend.
        Specified by:
        showAllProducts in interface ProductMapperInterface
        Parameters:
        propertyname - - for db connection
        Returns:
        returns an arraylist of all the products from the db
        Throws:
        ClassNotFoundException
        SQLException
        IOException

        public ArrayList<Products> showSearchedProduct(String search,
                                               String attribute,
                                               String propertyname)
                                        throws ClassNotFoundException,
                                               SQLException,
                                               IOException
        Shows an array of product(s) from a wildcard that has been searched for. It can contain 0-x depending on the ammount of matches.
        Specified by:
        showSearchedProduct in interface ProductMapperInterface

        search - - search input value
        attribute - - search value from dropdown
        propertyname - - for db connection
        Returns:

      • dbDownload

        public ArrayList<Products> dbDownload(String propertyname)
                               throws ClassNotFoundException,
                                      SQLException,
                                      IOException
        When we need to download the content of the database this method is used for selecting all with a join again and result.get 10/11 is skipped as the document we download should consist of readable data so not binary.
        Specified by:
        dbDownload in interface ProductMapperInterface
        Parameters:
        propertyname - - for db connection
        Returns:
        - returns all products as an arraylist used for Json download
        Throws:
        ClassNotFoundException
        SQLException
        IOException
